base_description: Blue and white 3D glasses with angular design.
part_description: Two blue lenses, white arms; angular shape, symmetrical arrangement.
internal_interaction_description: The blue lenses are connected to the white arms, forming a rigid structure. The arms are angled to fit over the ears, holding the lenses in place over the eyes. The lenses are positioned parallel to each other, ensuring proper vision alignment.
external_interaction_description: Designed to be worn on the face, the glasses fit over the ears and rest on the nose. They interact with 3D screens, enabling the viewer to perceive depth in compatible visual content. The angular design may also interact aesthetically with modern fashion styles.
